content: lacy fingerless gloves by christie pruitt materials 1 skein bernat baby fingering weight 100% acrylic white size e 3 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle finished size should fit a woman s size small/medium instructions chain 37 row 1 right side double_crochet in fifth chain from hook *skip next 3 chs 5 double_crochet in next chain skip next 3 chs double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next chain repeat from * across row 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet turn 2 double_crochet in next chain 1 space skip next 3 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet * 5 double_crochet in next chain 1 space skip next 3 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * across to last space 3 double_crochet in last space row 3 chain 4 turn double_crochet in first double_crochet * 5 double_crochet in next chain 1 space skip next 3 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * across repeat row 2 & 3 seven times or until desired length ending after row 2 do not cut yarn work a crab stitch reverse crochet across the top work single_crochet all around both sides and bottom of piece finishing with right sides together slip_stitch along side of glove for about 1 leave about a 1 ½ opening for thumb when seaming is complete tuck in ends work the 2nd glove the same way
